page.title: 13Llangybi Community Council
page.content: Llangybi Fawr Community Council has five elected members,of whom two represent Llangybi and one each represent Llanthewy,Llandegveth and Coedypaen.A part time parish clerk is employed.Meetings are held regularly in the village Hall and matters delt with include highways,footpaths,bridle paths,recreation areas and local planning applications.The council is represented on various bodies including the governing bodies of Usk and Caerleon Schools. Llantrisant Fawr Community Council has five elected members and a clerk.Two members represent Llantrisant,one Gwernesney,one Llanllowel and one Llangeview.As there is no hall in the village,meetings are held in Tredunnock Village Hall.
